hero.title:
Less admin work.
More time for what truly matters.
hero.subtitle: Organa automates your administrative workflows so you can spend more time with clients, on your business, and on what matters most.

docs.title: Scattered documents
docs.text: Invoices, quotes, client follow-ups, and documents spread out.

tools.title: Disconnected tools
tools.text: Tools that don’t talk to each other and a difficult follow-up.

mentalLoad.title: Mental load
mentalLoad.text: Admin work piles up and slows down day-to-day operations.

problem.label: The problem
problem.title: Your time is too valuable to be lost in admin work.

paragraphs.first: Invoices, quotes, client follow-ups, scattered documents, tools that don’t communicate… admin work accumulates, slows your business, and becomes a constant mental load.
paragraphs.second: This lost time has a real cost: less availability for clients, less energy to grow your business, and less time spent where it truly creates value.

solution.label: The Organa solution
solution.title: Centralize the essentials of your business, all in one place.
solution.paragraph: Organa was built to centralize the essential parts of your business: invoices, quotes, clients, administrative follow-up, and task management — all in one place.

organization.title: Clear organization
organization.text: One space to gather documents and administrative follow-up.

visibility.title: Accurate visibility
visibility.text: A reliable view of activity to move forward with confidence.

howItWorks.label: How it works
howItWorks.title: A simple workflow designed for daily management.
howItWorks.paragraph: By simplifying and structuring your administrative tasks, and tracking them over time, Organa helps you manage your business more efficiently.

steps.five: Run your business from the dashboard
steps.six: Track payments, tasks, and your schedule

quotes.title: Quotes and invoices
quotes.text: Create quotes, send them, then turn them into invoices.

tasks.title: Tasks and deadlines
tasks.text: Attach tasks to your quotes or invoices and track them over time.

tasksCalendar.label: Task & calendar management
tasksCalendar.title: Track actions over time, simply.
tasksCalendar.paragraph: Organa goes beyond document creation. Each quote, invoice, or client can be linked to tasks and deadlines. With the integrated calendar, you can plan meetings, organize follow-ups, and keep a clear view of what needs to be done today and tomorrow.

security.title: Security & data
security.text: Reliable hosting, privacy respected, and secure access to information.

time.title: Time savings & clarity
time.text: Centralized documents and immediate visibility on what’s sent or paid.

organization.title: Organization & follow-up
organization.text: Tracking of documents, payments, tasks, and calendar for structured management.

one.text: I manage quotes and invoices in Organa, and I immediately see what’s sent, paid, or needs follow-up. Tracking is much clearer.
one.author: Camille — Independent

two.text: We finally have one place for clients, documents, and payment follow-ups. Everything is centralized.
two.author: Marc — SME

three.text: Tasks linked to quotes and invoices are easy to track, and the calendar helps us organize deadlines.
three.author: Julie — Firm

four.text: The dashboard gives us a reliable overview. We know what’s approved, paid, pending, or needs follow-up.
four.author: Nadia — Small business

target.question: Who is Organa for?
target.answer: For freelancers and SMEs who want a clear, structured, and simple way to manage their activity.

free.question: Is there a free plan?
free.answer: Yes, Organa offers a free plan to get started.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, data security and confidentiality are top priorities.

easy.question: Is it easy to get started?
easy.answer: Yes, the tool is designed to be clear, without unnecessary features.
